name: McCarren Skatepark
description: Popular Williamsburg skatepark in McCarren Park. Great street-style layout.
history: Opened 2010, part of the McCarren Park renovation. Central to the Williamsburg skate scene.
bestTimes: Afternoons. Gets crowded on nice-weather weekends.
transitDirections: L to Bedford Ave or G to Nassau Ave.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include ledges, rails, flat bars, manual pads, quarter pipes. Well-maintained concrete construction.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Brooklyn skate scene in Williamsburg. Opened 2010, part of the McCarren Park renovation. Central to the Williamsburg skate scene.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: L to Bedford Ave or G to Nassau Ave.. Afternoons. Gets crowded on nice-weather weekends.
detailedNotes.warnings: Public skatepark â€” standard park etiquette applies.
